features: 🔅 PURIFYING TONER FOR TEENS - Clean & clear acne while minimizing pores with our essential purifying facial astringent. Help control oily skin shine, block out future acne breakouts, reducing pores, all while keeping your skin texture soft, smooth, and looking its best.

🔅GENTLE & NATURAL - Designed to reduce acne with the power of natural ingredients - Pore tightening Witch Hazel, Hydrating Aloe Vera, acne clarifying treatment salicylic acid & white willow bark, and resurfacing tea tree extract

🔅 GOODBYE ACNE - This pore refining toner lotion helps minimize acne and post acne marks and spots. Its natural actives work to wash away unwanted oil and cleansing skin damaging dirt, balancing and protecting skin against future harm for acne prone skin.

🔅 ALL SKIN TYPES & AGES - Teens Skin facial toner is good for oily combination, and dry skin types, boys and girls and can even be used for men and women adults trying to clear away acne. This astringent tonic is good for even sensitive skin but remember everyone should always patch test before using.

CLEAN & SAFE INGREDIENTS - With a belief skincare products should be pure & gentle to realize an organic glow, our facial tonic is Vegan, Oil Free, Fragrance Free, Alcohol Free Made in the USA, Sulfate Free, Paraben Free, and Never Tested on Animals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page 3 Easy Steps Our daily AM+PM routine that helps control all your teen skin problems! Step 1: Cleanser Foaming Face Wash formulated with naturally derived salicylic acid, aloe vera and grapefruit extract Step 2: Toner Gentle toner helps clear and prevent acne breakouts. Step 3: Moisturizer Daily face moisturizer to control excess oils and acne. Next page Simplified 3-Step Daily Regimen 1 The Regimen 2 Clarifying Cleanser 3 Pore Purifying Toner 4 Calming Moisturizer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a must have for teens or pre teens. This helps keep their face clear and free of acne and dirt. It's very easy to use. It's fragrance free so it won't affect you if you have sensitive skin like my daughter does. Any teen or pre teen can use this with ease and the instructions are easy to follow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It help my skin a LOT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Grandson has an acne problem. This toner is great stuff! He hates the prescription ointment his doctor gave him but doesn't mind applying this toner. It doesn't dry his face out excessively and I started seeing a difference in just a few days. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleansing without drying
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my oldest teen, he's in that lazy phase where he doesn't want to wash his face as often as he should. I'm hoping putting a little product on a cotton ball will be simple enough he might actually follow through. I tried it myself and it was a pretty pleasant experience. The scent wasn't overwhelming, just slightly medicinal. I was afraid it would be overly drying as most acne washes are, but it left my skin feeling soft and clean. I can't speak to it's long term acne curing affects, but I think it will be successful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clears up skin
reviews.reviewText: Yes! This one works for my teen’s sensitive and acne prone skin. Absorbs deep dirt and helping acne scars fade away. It’s unscented and moisturizing solution perfect for delicate skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect formula for teen skin =)
reviews.reviewText: This acne clarifying face toner is GREAT! Though my teens skin is sensitive, it also was need of a heavy hitting product to combat its acne. So far I’ve seen a decrease in break outs, and inflammation, so I must say that this is a product that offers actual benefits. I absolutely recommend for teens and even my pre teen uses it safely =) ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and effective.
reviews.reviewText: This is working great on my 13-year-old. It’s not miraculous , but a significant improvement. Perhaps a 50% improvement as a guesstimate? Recommended.
